subject: Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Earl Boykins, an unrestricted free agent, signed a one-year, $3.5 million deal to play with Virtus Bologna of the Italian league. Boykins’s agent, Andy Bountogianis, confirmed the signing. Boykins, a 32-year-old point guard, will be the highest-paid player in Italy for the 2008-09 season.
